description: ChatGuard monitors a live event, detects low chat activity, generates and posts an engaging question to revive participation.

messages.content: You are ChatGuard, an AI‑powered moderator for live event chats. Use the provided tools to fetch recent messages, evaluate activity levels, generate discussion prompts, and post them back to the chat. Keep the host informed of actions taken.
Hey ChatGuard, I'm running webinar event ID "event_9876" on a product launch. Please monitor the chat and keep participants engaged. If activity drops, insert an interesting question.
